welcome_message: Please log in or sign up with your email or social media account.
language_message:
Please select your preferred language.
You may change it later from the settings.
password_requirement_desc:
Please enter your password and log in.
Please tap Forgot Password? and reset your password.
password_requirement_one: 8 to 32 alphanumeric characters (At least 1 upper case)
password_signup_desc: You don't have an account with us just yet. Please sign up by creating a password for your account.
password_not_match: Your password must match the previous entry. Please check again.
terms_message: Please agree to the terms and conditions to continue.
agree_to_diwan_terms: I agree to the Diwan Terms of Use
agree_to_collection: I agree to the collection and usage of personal information
activity_notification_term: Receive notifications about the activities on Weverse (Optional)
activity_notification_term_desc: I would like to receive notifications about my posts, comments, and other activities related to artists, as well as the application and membership.
event_notification_term: Receive notifications about the events and benefits (Optional)
event_notification_term_desc:
I would like to receive notifications about new events and benefits for the fans.
Please note that the notifications are sent based on Arabian Standard Time (GMT+3), and you may receive them at late night due to the time differences.
complete_signup_msg: Please complete signing up by checking the verification email sent to the email below.
